content:
hi, just wanted to check if anyone knows if this is still the case with serde? dropping into a serde_json::Value is a bit clunky, but I don't know all the fields of the json object in advance -- only guaranteed a couple that I want to use.
https://users.rust-lang.org/t/serde-how-to-parse-json-partially/4751
Is there a way to deserialize arbitrary JSON using Serde without creating fine-grained objects?
